short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Index Notch helps you annotate scroll positions within webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Index Notch facilitates reading reading long articles on the web, which is often exhausting, by remembering certain scroll positions and lets you jump back and forth. 

Index Notch can be used not only in static websites, but also in SNS that are constantly loaded with new content.
